message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  How about $160?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your perspective. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at 180?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a little high for me.  I'm sticking with my original offer of $160.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that.
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at 175?
